documentation.text:
@title Executor represents core component for on-chain governance.
 The on-chain governance params can be changed by the Executor through a voting.
 A executive committee are composed to seven approvers who had been added to the contract Executor in the genesis block.
 The new approver can be added and the old approver also can be removed from the executive committee.
 The steps of executor include proposing, approving and executing voting if the voting was passed.
 Only the approver in the executive committee has the authority to propose and approving a voting.

@notice approving a voting from a approver
 @param _proposalID identify a voting
@notice remove an old approver '_approver' from the executive committee
@notice The contract which is attached can propose a voting

attributes.text:
@title Executor represents core component for on-chain governance.
 The on-chain governance params can be changed by the Executor through a voting.
 A executive committee are composed to seven approvers who had been added to the contract Executor in the genesis block.
 The new approver can be added and the old approver also can be removed from the executive committee.
 The steps of executor include proposing, approving and executing voting if the voting was passed.
 Only the approver in the executive committee has the authority to propose and approving a voting.

@notice approving a voting from a approver
 @param _proposalID identify a voting
@notice remove an old approver '_approver' from the executive committee
@notice The contract which is attached can propose a voting

params._data: call data, usually composed to method ID plus input data.
params._target: a contract address, it will be executed if the voting is passed.

devdoc.title: Executor represents core component for on-chain governance. The on-chain governance params can be changed by the Executor through a voting. A executive committee are composed to seven approvers who had been added to the contract Executor in the genesis block. The new approver can be added and the old approver also can be removed from the executive committee. The steps of executor include proposing, approving and executing voting if the voting was passed. Only the approver in the executive committee has the authority to propose and approving a voting.

addApprover(address,bytes32).notice: add new a new pprover '_approver' to the executive committee

approve(bytes32).notice: approving a voting from a approver

attachVotingContract(address).notice: The contract which is attached can propose a voting

execute(bytes32).notice: If the voting is passed, the '_proposalID' will be executed. If the two-thirds of approvers in the executive committee approve a voting, the voting will be passed. The voting must be finished one week, or it will be faied no matter pass or not.

propose(address,bytes).notice: proposing a voting from a approver

revokeApprover(address).notice: remove an old approver '_approver' from the executive committee
